description:
Moeru and Kathleena hold a secret meeting with some of the show`s more unloved VocaBots about how they can take the protagonist slot from Nejiru and Heybot. The Mojimoji, in a moment`s passion, sticks his plug into a picture of Heybot... which causes the real-life Heybot`s switch to start swelling!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヘボットのアレがはれた
